alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Hancock (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 26 at 7:59AM EDT until March 26 at 8:15AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN BALDWIN AND SOUTH CENTRAL HANCOCK COUNTIES... At 758 AM EDT, a confirmed tornado was located over Underwood, or 9 miles northeast of Milledgeville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Beulah and Underwood. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
